the programme was targeted to children rather than mothers. Although mixed results have been 
found, there is evidence that CCT programmes can have a positive impact on child nutritional 
status. To date most CCT programmes designed to improve nutritional and health outcomes have 
targeted children rather than mothers, resulting in a lack of data available on changes in maternal 
nutritional status (65).
